fields.Title of Intellectual Property: Utah State University Official Mobile Applilcation: Android release
fields.Description/Abstract:
Role: instructional technology design, development, and implementation. Lead for the team of artists and developers, initial widgets include:
1 USU Today: RSS feed with mobile formatting
2 USU Map: Map application with building list, office list, parking lots, shuttle routes, etc.
3 Athletics: RSS feed from athletic web site
4 Events & calendars: including academic events, calendars, and employee holidays
5 YouTube: USU YouTube videos using native mobile player
6 Banner Log-in: web link
7 Directory: web link
8 Tickets: web link
9 Donation: web link
10 Alumni: web link
11 ASUSU: web link
12 Radio: USU radio using native mobile player
13 Library: web link
14 Aggie mail: web link
15 Weather: Logan weather from mobile web link
